remarks: Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
frins2.1 $e |- R Fr A $.
frins2.2 $e |- R Se A $.
frins2.3 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
frins2.4 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
frins2 $p |- ( y e. A -> ph ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps y $.
